review:
*** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** ****** As per my interaction, I found him to be very practical and was able to provide a very confident diagnosis. My consultation experience was very smooth and it is good to see that they are maintaining such a strict covid protocol.
Overall - Highly Recommend

I met Dr. Himank for my cousin.
My cousin was suffering from epilepsy and inspite of consulting so many neurologist it was not getting controlled.
So after doing some very basic tests and listening to our history properly and patiently, he understood the underlying problem and started my cousin on different medications.
Been 6 months now and no new episode of seizure has occured.
Totally recommended..

I contacted Dr. Himank after hearing about him from a friend. Consulted for headache for which I had been to multiple doctors in past 6 months. Doctor was very patient in listening my problem, took time to evaluate and gave his valuable opinion. I was very pleased by the way he spent enough time in listening to my problems. 
His suggestions have been helpful to me. 
I recommend him to anyone in need of a neurologist.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I consulted the doctor for my father (83 years) who has parkinson's disease. The doctor explained everything nicely and resolved all our queries. He revised the treatment and we are due for a follow up visit. We would highly recommend him to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Wonderful experience n it satisfy the patience query n relieve his/ her all ailment related worries.  It is a experience of of highly skilled one

I just want to say dr himank goyal is best neurologist available... Before I consulted him I consulted two other neuro doctors but the way he listens to your problem and treats with personal touch is amazing.
I had a very good experience with Dr. Himank Goyal who cares the patient in a friendly way. I visited the doctor for my frequent headaches. I highly recommend the doctor to everyone.

**** **** ********* ** *******
I visited for appilepsy problem of my cousin  and found complete solution of my problem.
Really very much impressed 
Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Himank Goyal treated me for chronic headache. Now I am completely relieved of my headache. Highly recommended!
**** **** *************** Listen problem carefully,  and treatment is  wonderful . My headache is completely relived.
reply_text:
Thank You so much sir
For kind words
